paper.title: 1D-CNN-IDS: 1D CNN-based Intrusion Detection System for IIoT
paper.abstract: The demand for Internet of Things (IoT) has seen a rapid increase. These advances have been made possible by technological advances in artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and edge computing. However, these developments present a number of challenges, including cyber threats, security and privacy concerns, and the risk of potential financial losses. For this reason, this study developed a computationally inexpensive one-dimensional convolutional neural network (1DCNN) algorithm for cyber-attack classification. The proposed study achieved an accuracy of 99.90% to classify nine cyber-attacks. Several other performance metrics are evaluated to validate the effectiveness of the proposed scheme. In addition, a comparison has been made with the existing state-of-the-art schemes. The findings of the proposed study can significantly contribute to the development of secure intrusion detection for IIoT systems.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究基于1D-CNN的入侵检测系统，用于工业物联网(IIoT)中的网络安全，虽然提到了潜在财务损失的风险，但其核心技术并未直接应用于衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域。
